name: Planet Facts
description: Website that displays various facts about the planets in our solor system

name: Memory Game
description: Memory game that can be played with multiple players and different modes

description: Generate passwords, with thea ability to adjust password length and the type of characters used in the password

name: To-do list
description: Simple to-do application where users can create, delete, and update tasks. All tasks are stored in local storage
